nodes.text: A pulsar was a rapidly rotating neutron star. There were several pulsars in the galaxy, including 2GS-91E20, the Bedlam Pulsar, the Din Pulsar, the Godsheart, the Oolex Pulsar, the Thornhedge Pulsar, and the Vestor Pulsar. A pulsar was also located within the Unknown Regions.

Pulsars were first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 8: Scouts, a 1993 West End Games supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, and a pulsar first made an in-universe appearance in the 2011 novel Riptide, written by Paul S. Kemp.
